message.content:
cs.CR, cs.HC, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.SI. 

The paper discusses a methodology for information security risk assessment for medical devices, which falls under the category of cybersecurity (cs.CR). However, the study also involves the participation of senior healthcare Information Security Experts (ISEs) and senior Medical Experts (MEs), indicating a focus on healthcare (cs.HC). The methodology also involves ontology-based likelihood estimation and risk integration, which are common in software engineering (cs.SE) and cybersecurity (cs.CY). Additionally, the study involves the assessment of severity aspects, which is relevant to systems and information engineering (cs.SI).
